entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Richer
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:57 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
